title: Steve Reich, Busy as Ever, Enters His Late Period
description: At 86, this eminent composer takes a surprising but still searching direction in his music, while recent projects look back on six decades of work.
dc:creator: Joshua Barone
category: Music for Ensemble and Orchestra (Musical Work)
media:credit: Philip Montgomery for The New York Times
media:description: This year, Steve Reich has released two important albums and a conversations book. And his music has taken a turn with “Traveler’s Prayer,” which had its premiere at Carnegie on Tuesday.
